xml-example.value: Example of Invoice

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><Invoice xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"><id value="a3419362-1b68-49fe-84ab-e26a4449142a"/><meta><versionId value="1"/><lastUpdated value="2022-02-17T17:34:53.820+08:00"/><tag><system value="http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason"/><code value="HTEST"/><display value="test health data"/></tag></meta><identifier><system value="http://myHospital.org/Invoices"/><value value="654321"/></identifier><status value="issued"/><subject><reference value="Patient/example"/></subject><date value="2017-01-25T15:00:00+08:00"/><participant><role><coding><system value="http://snomed.info/sct"/><code value="17561000"/><display value="Cardiologist"/></coding></role><actor><reference value="Practitioner/example"/></actor></participant><issuer><identifier><system value="http://myhospital/NamingSystem/departments"/><value value="CARD_INTERMEDIATE_CARE"/></identifier></issuer><account><reference value="Account/example"/></account><totalNet><value value="40"/><currency value="EUR"/></totalNet><totalGross><value value="48"/><currency value="EUR"/></totalGross></Invoice>

Bad-Request-Response.value:
<OperationOutcome xmlns='http://hl7.org/fhir'>
<issue>
    <severity value='error'/>
    <code value='exception'/>
    <diagnostics value='validation error, path `resourceType` is required'/>
</issue>
</OperationOutcome>
